entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell Relative Routes Documentation Incorrect? #24292
  • Erro ao Criar um projeto com o .NET MUI APP #24291

Closed

  • Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception #21437
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • RefreshView IsEnabled enhancements #24290
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-refreshview

Merged

  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Try and make scroll-to test more solid #24286

Updated

  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-image
  • [Android] Add test for scroll without group #24288
    platform/android 🤖, i/regression
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • Remove non-functioning code and instead throw a more helpful platform-not-supported error #23617
    community ✨
  • CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #24142
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `WrapperView` #24281
    community ✨
  • fix 23921 #24275
    community ✨
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨
  • Build the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
